 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קוֺט‎</span>] dubious **verb intransitive**, assumed meaning ==break, snap== (supposed to be akin to Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***cut, cut off, pare, trim*** [whence [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]] assumes √ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קטט‎</span>]), to account for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְקוֺט‎</span> [[Job.8.14|Job 8:14]], either as **Qal** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular whose hope ***snappeth***; or as **noun [masculine]** = ***fragile thing*** (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בֵּית עַכָּבִישׁ‎</span>; compare [[BDB#Di|Di]] [[BDB#Bu|Bu]]); probably corrupt; [[BDB#Du|Du]] Beer read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קוּרִים‎</span> [[BDB#Bu|Bu]] conjecture <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קֻרֵי קַיִט‎</span> [Aramaism for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קַיִץ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ק‎</span>].
